actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-983.

official_title: A resolution reported relating to the History of the Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-983) Provides that there be printed with illustrations as a Senate document a revised compilation of materials entitled "History of the Committee on the Judiciary Together with Chairmen and Members Assigned Thereto, 1816-1976," and that there be printed 2,000 additional copies of such document for the use of the Committee on the Judiciary

titles.title: A resolution reported relating to the History of the Committee on the Judiciary.
